title: My family is in problems and it's my responsibility to develop. I am just 17 years old am not getting motivated to study well. What can I do? - Quora

response.answer_text: Focus and hard work is the key no matter what kind problems are going on in life. Once you get determined, set your goals, work on you plans for small and big goals… You would be busy enough that problems wont eat your head your anymore. Just be focused.

studying z not nly way to earn money or solve d prob... study z juz abt d knowledge... if u ve nly 1 choice means drop d study nw.. find d way to earn money... bcoz u cn continue it later . bt don't loose ur consentreat @ study.. improve ur skill automatically u get way .. hardwork never fail  .. gud luck
